top_questions.text: A sequential data file called "student.txt" has stored data under the field heading Name, Class, Address and Age. Write a program to display all the information of those whose class is 10 and gender is "male".
Give any two examples of DBMS.
Which view of MS Access helps us to modify table?
Write down the output of the given program. Show with dry run in table. [3] DECLARE SUB DTB (N). CLS N = 5126 CALL DTB
Write down the output of the given program. Show with dry run in table. [3] DECLARE SUB DTB (N). WHILE N <> 0 R = N MOD 10 S = S + R N = N \ 10 WEND PRINT S; END SUB
